<<<<<<< HEAD
An epistle recommended to all the prisons in this city & nation. To such as chuse restraint rather than the violation of their consciences. Wherein is asserted, 1. The lawfulness of an oath. 2. The antiquity of an oath. 3. The universality of it. With the most material objections answered. By Henry Den. Denne, Henry, 1606 or 7-1660?
8 p.
printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle near Temple-Bar, London : 1660.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 5", "Feb: 5". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

8 p.
printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle near Temple-Bar, London : 1660.
